alert.note: Alert for Northern Litchfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 23 at 3:30PM EDT until March 24 at 12:00PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON EDT THURSDAY... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow and sleet accumulations of up to one inch and ice accumulations of around one quarter of an inch, except around one third of an inch across higher elevations in southern Vermont. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Southern Vermont, northern Litchfield County in northwestern Connecticut, and western Massachusetts. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to noon EDT Thursday. * IMPACTS...Power outages and some tree damage are possible due to the ice and gusty winds. Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions will impact the Thursday morning commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Greatest impacts will be for elevations above 1000 feet.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
